changeSceneLevel(int) - Method in class SceneManager

Character - Class in <Unnamed>
Abstract class Character is to regulates possible statues and behaviors of a any character in the game.
Character(Map) - Constructor for class Character
Class constructor to create a character on the map of the game.
checkAteByFlower(EatPeopleFlower) - Method in class Player
Check whether player eaten by people eating flower.
checkHit(Player) - Method in class Boss
Check whether the player is hit by attack of the boss.
checkHit(Player) - Method in class Enemy
Validation to check whether collision happens between players and enemies, further action proceeds like reduce HP of player.
checkHit(Player) - Method in class Mushroom
No intention to use
checkHit(Enemy) - Method in class Player
Check whether fireball intersect with enemy instance and trigger enemy's hp deduction and produce corresponding sound effect.
Coin - Class in <Unnamed>
Class Coin represents coin objects during gameplay.
Coin(Map) - Constructor for class Coin
Class constructor initializes width, height, image, animation for a mushroom with a map instance to reveal specified location on the map.
